long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an online shopper? Prino will save you hundreds before you know it.

Have you ever bought a TV only to find it $200 cheaper at another store? Prino won't let that happen again.

Have you ever bought a bluetooth speaker when it was on 10% off sale without knowing that it is regularly on 20% off special every couple of months. Prino will help you predict that.

Have you ever wasted hours walking through the aisles to see if your favourite brand of paper towel or laundry liquid is on special? Prino will save you time.

Have you ever missed a deal because it was out of stock before you were aware of the deal? Prino will let you know as soon as a deal starts.
